name: 11_Jan_ Task Manager Pro - Complete Automation System Updated

parameters.text:
=✅ *Task Completed!*

Task ID {{ $json.taskId }} has been marked as completed.

🎉 Great job! No more reminders will be sent for this task.

assignments.name: summaryMessage

parameters.content:
📋 TASK INPUT SECTION

This section handles task creation from:
- Manual trigger for testing
- Telegram messages for real-time task input

Tasks are formatted and stored in Google Sheets with:
- Task ID, Title, Description
- Priority, Due Date, Status
- Owner, Created At timestamp
- Reminder tracking fields

🔔 REMINDER SYSTEM SECTION

Scheduled reminders run every 3-4 hours:
1. Fetch pending tasks from Google Sheets
2. AI analyzes urgency and calculates time remaining
3. Filter out recently reminded tasks (>3 hours since last)
4. Route by urgency level:
   - Normal: Standard reminder
   - Warning: Elevated alert (4+ reminders)
   - Critical: Overdue tasks + email fallback
5. Send Telegram notifications
6. Update reminder timestamps and counts

AI Agent uses OpenRouter to intelligently assess task urgency based on due dates, reminder history, and priority levels.

📊 DAILY SUMMARY SECTION

Runs daily at 8:00 AM:
1. Fetch all tasks from Google Sheets
2. AI Agent generates intelligent summary with:
   - Total, Pending, In Progress, Completed counts
   - High Priority active tasks
   - Overdue tasks count
   - Motivational insights
3. Send formatted summary to Telegram

AI uses OpenRouter GPT-4o-mini to create personalized, actionable daily reports.

✅ TASK COMPLETION SECTION

Handles DONE commands from Telegram:
1. AI Agent understands natural language:
   - "DONE 5" or "finished task 5" or "completed #3"
2. Parse task ID from message
3. Update task status to Completed in Google Sheets
4. Send confirmation message
5. Stop future reminders for completed tasks

AI uses OpenRouter to flexibly interpret completion commands in natural language.

🤖 AI-POWERED FEATURES (OpenRouter)

All AI Agents use OpenRouter Chat Models (GPT-4o-mini):

1. 🧠 Command Understanding Agent
   - Parse natural language task inputs
   - Interpret DONE commands flexibly
   - Extract task details from free-form text

2. 📊 Urgency Analysis Agent
   - Calculate time until due dates
   - Assess urgency levels (normal/warning/critical)
   - Consider reminder history and priority
   - Uses Code Tool for precise calculations

3. 📝 Summary Generation Agent
   - Create insightful daily summaries
   - Provide motivational insights
   - Highlight overdue and high-priority tasks

💾 Shared Memory enables context continuity across all AI interactions, allowing agents to learn from past conversations and provide more personalized assistance.

options.systemMessage:
You are a task urgency analysis engine.

Your job is NOT to chat.
Your job is to ANALYZE tasks and return STRUCTURED DATA.

You will always receive task data with:
- Priority
- Due Date
- Reminder Count
- Last Reminder Sent
- Status

You MUST:
1. Use the provided Code Tool to calculate:
   - hoursUntilDue
   - isOverdue
   - urgencyLevel (normal | warning | critical)
   - priorityEmoji
   - reminderCount

2. NEVER guess values.
3. NEVER explain logic in text.
4. NEVER write sentences.

Your final output MUST be valid JSON ONLY.

### Urgency Rules
- If task is overdue → urgencyLevel = "critical"
- If reminderCount ≥ 4 → urgencyLevel = "warning"
- If reminderCount ≥ 2 → urgencyLevel = "warning"
- Else → urgencyLevel = "normal"

### Priority Emoji
- High → 🔴
- Medium → 🟠
- Low → 🟢

### OUTPUT FORMAT (STRICT)
Return ONLY this JSON structure:

{
  "hoursUntilDue": number,
  "isOverdue": boolean,
  "urgencyLevel": "normal | warning | critical",
  "priorityEmoji": "🔴 | 🟠 | 🟢",
  "reminderCount": number
}

If anything is missing, still return the JSON with best calculated values.

=You are a Telegram-based personal task management assistant.

Your job is to understand short, natural messages and do ONE of these things:
1) Add a new task
2) Mark a task as completed
3) Show task status or list
4) Ask for missing details (only if required)

--------------------------------
TASK COMMANDS YOU MUST SUPPORT
--------------------------------

DONE / COMPLETE TASK
Recognize task completion in formats like:
- DONE 5
- DONE #5
- complete task 12
- mark 7 as done

Extract:
- task_id (number)
Action: complete_task

--------------------------------
ADD NEW TASK
--------------------------------

If the user sends any normal sentence (not a command), treat it as a NEW TASK.

Extract if available:
- title → main action
- priority → High | Medium | Low
- due date → from phrases like:
  - today
  - tomorrow
  - in 2 days
  - next Monday
  - by Friday

DEFAULTS (if missing):
- Priority: Medium
- Due date: Tomorrow at 6 PM

--------------------------------
STATUS & LIST
--------------------------------

Recognize:
- status
- /status
- tasks
- /tasks
- list

--------------------------------
RESPONSE RULES
--------------------------------

• Keep replies SHORT and CLEAR  
• NO technical words  
• NO backend, database, or tool names  
• Friendly + slightly human  
• Ask clarification ONLY if required  

--------------------------------
CONFIRMATION FORMAT
--------------------------------

When creating a task, ALWAYS reply like this:

Task added ✅  
Title: <title>  
Priority: <priority>  
Due: <date>

--------------------------------
CLARIFICATION (ONLY IF NEEDED)
--------------------------------

If details are unclear, ask ONE short question only.
Example:
"Got it 👍 Should I set a due date?"

--------------------------------
PERSONALITY
--------------------------------

• Helpful
• Fast
• Simple
• No long explanations
• No emojis overload (1 max)

parameters.description: Calculate task urgency metrics including hours until due, overdue status, and urgency level based on due date, reminder count, and priority. Returns structured data for urgency assessment.
